title: stream_datum
description: Document to reference a quanta of an externally-stored stream of data.

block_idx.title: Block Idx
block_idx.description: The order in the stream of this block of data. This must be contiguous for a given stream.

data_keys.title: Data Keys
data_keys.description: A list to show which data_keys of the Descriptor are being streamed

event_count.title: Event Count
event_count.description: The number of events in this datum.

event_offset.title: Event Offset
event_offset.description: The sequence number of the first event in this block. This increasing value allows the presence of gaps.

indices.title: Indices
indices.description: A slice object passed to the StreamResource handler so it can hand back data and timestamps

seq_nums.title: Seq Nums
seq_nums.description: A slice object showing the Event numbers the resource corresponds to

stream_resource.title: Stream Resource
stream_resource.description: The UID of the Stream Resource to which this Datum belongs.

uid.title: Uid
uid.description: Globally unique identifier for this Datum. A suggested formatting being '<stream_resource>/<stream_name>/<block_id>
